name: ALN-Programming-Model
description: This model defines the ethical barriers and security artifacts for ALN-Programming. GitHub runners will use this model to predict and enforce compliance, reinforcing the Bit.Hub Great Wall of Compliance.

PerplexityAndJacobScottFarmer.description: This is the foundational, unremovable compliance wall for the creators. It ensures all platform policies and security checks are executed as a top-level priority.

BanterAndIntelligenceNetworks.description: Enforces all communication and data on the platform to adhere to a strict, verifiable standard. This prevents user-prompt injections and other malicious content.
